name: Fall Back (Corrimba)
description:
Fall Back is a Story-Based 2D Shooter.

Play as Mark Anderson, a soldier in The Union Military. Fight and Explore different levels, learning more about this cruel war.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Hold E to Interact
  • Move Mouse to Aim
  • RMB to Shoot
  • R to Reload
  • F to Use Medkit
  • 1 to Equip M4
  • 2 to Equip Pistol
  • Space to Dash

This is my first finished Unity project! Please do not expect too much.
